data.product_title: Multipet Mini Lamb Chop Officially Licensed, Plush, Squeak Pet Toy (White, 10')
about_product: Shari Lewis' classic and beloved lamb is adored by dogs
Extra soft plush exterior is great for cuddling
Pet should be supervised while playing
data.product_description: Multipet now offers Lambchop as a dog toy. Lambchop is 10 tall and this Shari Lewis TV puppet was a classic during the 60's and is now back as a great plush toy that squeaks for your dog."

product_information.Directions: Multipet Mini Lamb Chop Officially Licensed, Plush, Squeak Pet Toy (White, 10')

product_details.Best Sellers Rank: #74 in Pet Supplies (See Top 100 in Pet Supplies)    #1 in Plush Toys for Dogs

data.customers_say: Customers find the plush toy cute, soft, and cuddly, with five different squeakers and perfect for both big and small dogs. However, the durability and quality receive mixed reviews, with some saying it lasts a long time while others report it falling apart easily. Moreover, opinions on value are divided, with some considering it well worth the price while others find it not worth the money.

top_reviews.review_comment: Adorable but it doesn't hold up. Lasted a few minutes because my dog ripped it to shreds. If your dog will cuddle with it then buy it! But if they will attack ot and chew it don't waste your money. Sad because the squeaker was loud and it kept my dog intrigued. Weight was normal for a dog plush toy. Chewability is very. Very low. Great value for your money got it on sale for 6.99.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: My dog LOVES to destroy Lamb Chop and he's very hard on his toys. However, he has yet to destroy this one! He LOVES that it is so big (it's bigger than I expected for the price!). This has become one of his favorite toys now. The only downside is the squeakers don't hold up long, but it's still holding up well 2 months in to my 75 pound, 2 year old German Shepherd playing with it almost daily (including dragging it outside into the mud) - so to me, it's still a big win!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Adorable Multipet Lamb Chop Dog Plush Toy - Squeaky Toy
top_reviews.review_comment: Multipet Lamb Chop Dog Plush Toy - Squeaky Toy for All Dogs - Extra Soft Plush - Stuffed Animal Dog Toy for Cuddling & Playing - Cute Pet Toy (6", Cream) ~ My male Chihuahua is almost 10 years old. He still likes to chew on and play with toys sometimes. I wasn’t sure if he would like this Lamb Chop plush toy because it’s almost as big as he is. Haha, But he loves it. He lies his head on the toy, chews on it, or sometimes keeps it by his side. He’s had it for a couple of months now and he immediately chewed off one ear, but he’s left the other ear alone. I assume he likes it better this way. Haha Very glad I purchased this toy. Very study. It took a while for my dog to chew off the ear, I was surprised he did it. The rest of the toy is in great shape even with all the chewing. I will toss the toy somewhere and tell him to, “Go get Lamb Chop.” He enjoys this for a little while. The toy is well-made, so cute, soft, and a good value for your money.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Adorable toy for a small dog... Lambchop is a perennial favorite with my dogs!
top_reviews.review_comment: The full-sized Lambchop squeaky toy was always the favorite toy of my Australian Shepherd and Golden Retrievers... When I just got my newest dog, a Miniature Dachshund, I looked for a smaller version of Lambchop for her. This little guy was PERFECT! She's now officially the favorite toy of my Doxie, too! While the smaller version has less squeakers in it than the large version (which had squeakers in each leg, in addition to the body and head!), this little toy is adorable and squeaks just right for my little Princess! Kalina (the Doxie) gives it 2-claws-up rating!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: This is my second time purchasing this dog toy. It's my little PomChi' favorite toy. It gives her hours of play and comforts her at night in her crate. It is of good quality, and, its a material based toy and with all the play, the seams will eventually tear open. I could have restuffed it, but chose to purchase a new one since its only $3.99. This one I'll sew as soon as I see the seams are open. Do not let this deter you from purchasing, its soft, cute, and your small dog will LOVE it.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: My 90 pound Rottweiler takes this with him wherever he goes. I gave it a 5 because he loves it so much. Unfortunately it’s not very durable. I’ve had to sew it up several times.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: I don’t know what it is about this toy but it’s my dog’s favorite toy, and I’ve bought at least 3 or 4 of them for her. She loves to chew it and tear out the fluff and squeaky mechanism after squeaking it a good few hundred times 😁! Every time I buy a new one she gets so happy and excited! Very good quality and value and she has so much fun with it!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: It is an ok toy, but not for my doggo but the Jumbo version is the perfect toy for Kota-Ghost.
top_reviews.review_comment: Adorable & nice but... I hate writing adverse reviews but I had to for this one. It lasted exactly 1 minute. 30 seconds of that was Ghost pulling the rest of the stuffing out to completely gut this Lambie. I know what happened-The material on the chest and the little red buttons were the issue. Cute as it may be, that material is terrible. My Great Pyrenees/AmStaff/Golden Retriever Mix boy, Kota-Ghost, very rarely tears his stuffy squeaky toys up. He is only 7 months old and has only shown interest in tearing something up if it was already broken(had an existing rip or tear)This is only the 2nd or 3 toy he has torn up in his whole life(and he literally has at least 30 stuffy toys(some left by my sweet Bella--she passed away in March but most are brand new because when I saw he wasn't a Destructo-Dog, I went a bit overboard buyin him stuffies-So much that my Hubs was not happy with me but he was secretly glad I did it😈.) See my review for the Jumbo Lambchop toy-That toy was and IS quite possibly the best stuffed squeaky toy available for bigger dogs. Only the MultiPet brand Jumbo tho-There are other brands that arent great. You can tell by the materials used on the face of the real Jumbo 24 inch ones from MultiPet. The Jumbo was a much better experience for us! I have also ordered the smaller one for him becuz he really wants the cat's lambie toy too. They have the 6 inch, not the "cat toy" version and they(and Ghost)love it. No one tears it up. I'll review it once his is delivered because while I know he doesnt rip the 6 inch one apart it is technically the cat's toy(not his) and we usually make him give it back to them pretty quickly. Ill review it when he gets his own & is allowed to do whatever he chooses. Hopefully he will treat it like Jumbo Lambie...Ok well, maybe not exactly that way cuz...Well, Lets just say he gets very, erhmm, frisky with his Jumbo Lambie. He doesnt like when we wash her but we do. Unfortunately he tries to take her outside in the dirt, in the pool with him. I will mention that more in my review for Jumbo Lambie. As for this standing up version-It MIGHT be fine for your dog or cat but it definitely was not durable for my Ghostie. It is a good size for a smaller/medium sized dog but definitely not good for puos that still have their deciduous(milk/needle)teeth and not for even light to moderate chewers due to the material on the chest. That's what made Ghost tear his up. He nicked it with his teeth, a hole formed and that was apparently his cue to rip the squeaker out & tear the poor toy to shreds-He did have fun doing it tho. Haha. For some dogs this toy might be great fun. It is definitely a great brand and the jumbo version is Ghost's fave toy of all time. Pricing on all of MultiPet's dog toys are amazing and I hope they stay that way! We keep several of the Jumbo Lambies here in case one "goes swimming" so we can wash it and he has one to carry/cuddle or in case one gets left somewhere cuz he wants to take it everywhere we go.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2025

top_reviews_global.review_comment: My Golden Retriever loves her lambchops. So getting another lambchop makes her happy. Now she has a litter of lamchops. Good quality
My pet dog simply loves Io play with it.
Cute as always and my dog loves lamb chop products but it came with the big squeaker broken

My dog somehow knew the package was for her without evening opening it. Something about these toys must smell amazing to dogs. Squeeqers are great and it's fairly durable for a stuffed toy. Loved to death, and is not indestructable, but still very much worth it
Looks super cute, but the quality is not great, fell apart very quickly
top_reviews_global.review_date: Reviewed in South Africa on September 6, 2025
